original_text: See Jeremiah 10:12-16. The Lord used his power to make the earth. He used his wisdom to make it strong. He knew how to put the sky to cover the earth. The Lord used his power to make the earth.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 능력으로 땅을 지으셨고 그의 지혜로 세계를 세우셨고 그의 명철로 하늘들을 펴셨으며

sentences.original_text: The Lord used his power to make the earth.
He used his wisdom to make it strong.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 지혜로 땅을 견고하게 만드셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He knew how to put the sky to cover the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하늘을 땅을 덮도록 두는 방법을 알았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord used his power to make the earth.
